subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Heart
lead_paragraph: Alberto Salazar, the three-time New York City Marathon champion, was released from the hospital, one week after he had a heart attack at the Nike campus outside Portland, Ore. Officials at Providence St. Vincent Medical Center declined to provide details of Salazar’s condition.
